name: USCoreCommonSDOHAssessments
title: US Core Common SDOH Assessments ValueSet
desc:
Common SDOH assessment concepts covering the following categories:
 - Food
 - Housing
 - Health
 - Employment
 - Care
 - Transit
 - Money
 - Goods
 - Education
 - Legal
